definition: Pearl River (Guangdong)

sentences.english: Extraoral vast shoals of the Pearl River waterfront, the underwater beach off the coast to slow gradient.

sentences.english: Jinhongri knitting manufactory locates in Guangzhou, the delta hinterland along the pearl river.

sentences.english: Hainan Island was called the Pearl Cliffs, Fine Jade Cliffs, and the Fine Jade Land.
sentences.chinese: 海南島被稱爲珠江懸崖，琿懸崖，和優良的翡翠土地。

sentences.english: Hong Kong must integrate with the delta to stay competitive with northern and eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 香港必須和珠江三角洲整合，才能和華北及華東競爭。

sentences.english: In this paper the hydrologic forecasting of a certain river in the Pearl River Basin has been taken as an example.

sentences.english: I worked for the product launch of Pearl River - Supra White Beer yesterday.

sentences.english: And imported water hyacinth plants are choking some parts of the Yangtze River and the Pearl River.
sentences.chinese: 而進口的水葫蘆正在淤塞長江和珠江的部分河段。

sentences.english: Disputes are especially common in the Pearl River manufacturing area in southeastern China.

sentences.english: Strengthen the Pearl River Piano viewer brand recognition.
